items.sentence: I think the birthday boy needs a glass of champagne.
I couldn't see anything because the lights were off.
I can't buy anything because I don't have any money.
I can't drive anywhere because my car's in the shop.
For the best hamburger in town, go to Chuck's Diner.
If it were me, I'd buy the one with a larger screen.
Tom plays the tenor sax and Mary plays the alto sax.
We went through St. Louis on the way to New Orleans.
I couldn't afford to buy a bicycle, much less a car.
Fragments of the mirror were scattered on the floor.
